result.value: F. Cremer, M. Urbazaev, J. Cortés, J. Truckenbrodt, C. Schmullius and C. Thiel, "Potential of Recurrence Metrics from Sentinel-1 Time Series for Deforestation Mapping," in IEEE Journal of Selected Topics in Applied Earth Observations and Remote Sensing, vol. 13, pp. 5233-5240, 2020, doi: [10.1109/JSTARS.2020.3019333](https://dx.doi.org/10.1109/JSTARS.2020.3019333).

# Contributing to RQADeforestation.jl

First off, thanks for taking the time to contribute!
This file collects important information for local development of the package.

## Local setup

Install `just` into your system, following its README [installation instructions](https://github.com/casey/just?tab=readme-ov-file#installation).

Then run

```bash
just init
```

This will for instance setup pre-commit to enforce the standard Julia styling [blue](https://github.com/JuliaDiff/BlueStyle).

## Issues

We use [GitHub issue tracker](https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/issues).
Pull Requests to the [origin main branch](https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl) are always welcome!

## Tests

Tests entrypoint is the [test directory](test).
We use [TestItemRunner](https://github.com/julia-vscode/TestItemRunner.jl) for unit tests.

## Documentation

We use [Documenter](https://documenter.juliadocs.org/stable/) to document the individual Julia functions.
See the [docs directory](docs) for further details.
In addition, we document the entire umbrella project [here](https://earthyscience.github.io/FAIRSenDD/).
Sentinel-1 based deforestation detection written in Julia
Sentinel-1 based deforestation detection based on recurrence quantification analysis (RQA) and written in Julia.
The aim of this project is to provide a forest change detection algorithm in Julia.

This project was funded by the European Space Agency in the Science Result Long-Term Availability & Reusability Demonstrator Initiative.
In addition, this project was supported by the ESA Network of Resources.

result.description:
This release represent the code at the mid term review of the FAIRSenDD project used for code improvement benchmarks.

## What's Changed
* Bump codecov/codecov-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/33
* Set runner to self-hosted by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/34
* Add CompatHelper compat entries by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/42
* Rqatrend allocationfree by @schlichtanders in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/45
* including handling of missing inside rqatrend_impl by @schlichtanders in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/51
* Add testdata as artifact by @meggart in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/50
* Add mock rqatrend by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/41
* Packagecompile by @schlichtanders in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/53
* Add packagecompiler CI by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/54
* Fix packagecompile CI by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/55
* Fix compathelper by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/57
* Update compats by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/63
* Add compiled packages to docker by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/68
* Fix docker by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/69
* small type improvements by @schlichtanders in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/56
* Update Artifacts.toml by @meggart in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/72
* Bump docker/build-push-action from 2 to 6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/67
* Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/66
* Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/65
* Bump docker/login-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/64
* Fix compile DiskArrays by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/86
* Update API dates use timespan by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/85
* Aggregate different scenes with DAE by @felixcremer in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/79
* Fix main function by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/91
* Consolidate zarr metadata to allow open from object store and web by @danlooo in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/93

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/33
* @schlichtanders made their first contribution in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/45
* @meggart made their first contribution in https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/pull/50

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/EarthyScience/RQADeforestation.jl/compare/v0.1...v0.2
